summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Pet Silk Top Knot Gel (4 Ounce) - Pet Hair Gel for Taming Frizzy Hair & Controlling Flyaways – Dog Anti-Static Lotion Cream with Floral Fragrance – Eliminates Static Charges Review Date: 2017/01/28 Store: PET SILK Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'PET SILK', 'Scent': 'Floral', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Cream,Gel', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 2.56 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '844854', 'UPC': '872429001513', 'Manufacturer': 'Pet Silk'} Review Text: This stuff is amazing! I didn't even know such a product existed and was excited to try it when I found it. My baby shih tzu has a top knot that's in the awkward stage where most will stay in a band or clip but the lower pieces fall down into her eyes.

I applied a bit of this and all the hair is staying put, LOVE THIS SO MICH! This tub will probably last me awhile but when it's gone I will be back to buy more. Review Title: Keeps puppy and dog fly-away hairs firmly in their bands Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ELEVEN EVER Electric Nail Drill, Professional Portable Nail File Drill Grinder Manicure Pedicure Tools for Polishing, Sanding, Removing Gel and Acrylic Nails (silver) … (silver) (ND-02black) Review Date: 2019/07/26 Store: ELEVEN EVER Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ELEVEN EVER', 'Material': 'Aluminum', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Maximum Rotational Speed': '30000 RPM', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.17 x 6.22 x 2.91 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '722943850534'} Review Text: Nice nail kit, very thorough on the selection of accessories. Works great. Review Title: Lots of accessories Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: N3 No Name Necessary Pore Minimizing Moisturizing Scented Long-Lasting Anti-aging and Hydrating Face Primer Spray – (200ml) Review Date: 2019/07/26 Store: No Name Necessary Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Normal', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Specialty': 'Moisturizing, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 1.8 x 1.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} Review Text: Good primer. It sprays on and feels a little sticky for about thirty seconds but then dries and feels smooth on your face. Makeup goes on great and stays on really well. Wish it had an SPF. Recommended. Review Title: No SPF but keeps makeup in place great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JOYYUM 1000W 2-in-1 Hot Air Spin Brush Styler Auto-rotating Negative Ionic Hair Curler Dryer Brush, 1 1/2 Inch and 2 Inch Brush Attachments, Lavander Fog Review Date: 2019/09/23 Store: JOYYUM Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JOYYUM', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Portable, Massage, Hot', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Curling', 'Package Dimensions': '16.3 x 5.4 x 3.2 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '787414814279', 'Manufacturer': 'JOYYUM'} Review Text: I have shorter hair and this worked really well for me, I honestly wasn’t expecting that it was going to work in my shorter hair as the Barrel seems large but to the contrary it does a fabulous job. Recommended Review Title: A real time saver Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mountain Falls Advanced Formula Nail Polish Remover Pads with 96% Acetone, for Natural Nails, 10 Count Review Date: 2019/09/23 Store: Mountain Falls Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Pad', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '10 Count'} Review Text: Very handy and work great. Took these on vacation recently and it was great to not need to take the bottle and worry about leakage. Usually one pad will do all your nails but sometimes it takes a couple. Recommended Review Title: Great for travel Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mountain Falls Nourishing Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 6 Fluid Ounce Review Date: 2019/09/30 Store: Mountain Falls Product Description: ["Don't wait for your next spa day to treat yourself. Mountain Falls Nourishing Nail Polish Remover has been carefully formulated to quickly and gently care for your nails. The salon quality formula softens cuticles and contains Vitamin E. Quickly, easily, and gently returns nails to their natural healthy appearance. Our formula is free of Parabens, and Phthalates."] Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '6 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '6.38 x 3 x 1.18 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'} Review Text: Great polish remover. I used it to remove three coats of polish and it took it off with one swipe. Recommended Review Title: Great remover Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

1. **Pet Care**: Strong interest in grooming products for pets, particularly those that aid in styling and managing fur, showing a commitment to maintaining their pet's appearance.

2. **Nail Care**: Frequent purchases of electric nail care tools and polish remover, indicating a proactive approach to personal nail care and aesthetics. Preference for products that include multiple accessories or features for convenience.

3. **Beauty and Skincare**: A focus on products that enhance makeup application, particularly face primers, demonstrating a keen interest in beauty routines. Products are selected based on effectiveness and sensory experience (e.g., texture and feel).

4. **Travel Convenience**: Preference for practical and portable beauty items, such as nail polish remover pads, indicates an active lifestyle with a need for products that simplify on-the-go beauty routines.

5. **Quality and Reviews**: Tendency to select products with solid ratings and reviews, suggesting a discerning shopper seeking both effectiveness and reliability in their purchases.

6. **Scent Preference**: A notable inclination towards products with appealing scents, particularly in pet care and skincare, highlighting the importance of pleasant fragrances in their product choices. 

Overall, this shopper values functionality, quality, and aesthetic appeal in pet care and personal beauty products, often seeking convenient solutions to enhance both their pet’s and their own grooming routines.

target_interaction.title: Wonderful product
target_interaction.text: Nice salt scrub, leaves my skin feeling so soft and smelling nice.  Recommended.
target_interaction.title_meta: Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
features: Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub With Marula Oil Works As an Anti-Aging Agent, Protecting Your Skin From Damaging Free Radicals, and Preventing Wrinkles and Fine Lines.
Infused with Himalayan Pink Salt, Which Is Rich In Minerals, and Natural Marula Oil, It Helps Revitalize and Invigorate Your Skin, While Leaving It Moisturized and Refreshed.
Himalayan Salt Body Scrub Will Help You Relax & Wash Away Tension. Himalayan Salt Provides a Perfect Mineral-Rich Buffer To Remove The Dull, Dead Skin Cells, Bringing New Life To Your Skin.
Apply a Generous Amount to Wet Skin While Moving in Circular Motion. Rinse with Water. Use 3-4 Times Per Week For Best Result. Recommended To Use Other Natural Solution Products.
description: Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types
